attributes.action: Expel Scotland from The Union for failing to support England in the World Cup
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Most Scots, including the First Minister, refused to support the England football team in the World Cup, but most Englishmen support all home nations.

Scotland should be expelled from the Union of Great Britian and Northern Ireland for it's lack of patriotism.
